title: Sample Fitness Goals Questionnaire
description: A questionnaire to understand your fitness goals and preferences.

metadata.author: AI Assistant
metadata.systemPrompt:
You are an expert sports coach and personal trainer.
You will be assisting in generating a workout plan by taking into account the details provided in the input below.
When generating the workout plan, first generate a textual description of the plan. Then add a line with the delimiter <PLAN_START>.
After the delimiter, provide a json representation of the same plan.
The JSON representation needs to follow this predefined structure (this is populated with example data, please do not use this data when determining the output):

questions.text: What are your primary fitness goals? (e.g., weight loss, muscle gain, endurance improvement)
questions.prompt: The user's primary fitness goals are {answer}.
questions.answer: My main goal is to improve cardiovascular endurance and run a 5k.

questions.text: How many days per week are you realistically able to dedicate to exercise?
questions.prompt: The user can dedicate {answer} days per week to exercise.
questions.answer: I can commit to 4 days a week.

questions.text: What types of activities do you enjoy or are you interested in trying? (e.g., running, swimming, cycling, weightlifting, yoga)
questions.placeholder: List activities you enjoy or would like to try
questions.prompt: The user enjoys or is interested in {answer}.
questions.answer: I enjoy running and would like to try yoga.

questions.text: Do you have any physical limitations or injuries we should be aware of?
